error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. Dan initially has 50 dimes, not 48, so he now has 2+50=52 dimes.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 4
Dimes are worth $0.10 and Barry has $10 worth of dimes so he has 10/0.1 = <<10/0.1=100>>100 dimes
Dan has half the amount of dimes as Barry so Dan has 100/2 = <<100/2=50>>50 dimes
Dan finds 2 more dimes on his way home so he now has 2+48 = <<2+48=50>>50 dimes
